response.summary: Accountable Civil Engineer with experience in Cost Estimating, Scheduling and Project Management. Proactive with new technologies for construction reinforced by strong problem-solving capabilities, resulting in efficient and successful project estimates and project management. Professional committed to excellence and integrity delivering estimates and projects that ensure quality for the client and safety for the team at the jobsite. Outstanding interpersonal skills, leadership capabilities oriented towards teamwork and decision making in critical situations common in construction.
response.skills: Civil Engineering, Construction Drawings, AutoCAD, AutoCAD Civil 3D, Topographic Surveys, Concrete, Pay Applications, Purchase Orders, Construction Management, Structural Engineering, SAP2000, Spanish, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel

profile_positions.description:
As Cost Estimator at Precision 2000, Inc. I am in charge of preparing cost proposals based on drawings and specs provided by project owners. Additionally, I work closely with subcontractors and suppliers to obtain quotes for estimates preparation. As part of my role, I help with the training of Junior Estimators and Interns. Under this endeavor I have been part of the team that implemented the use of HCSS HeavyBid and drone technology.
Additionally, I provide support for projects that are currently under construction. I am convinced that this is important for any estimator to keep up to date with the market trends. 
Below is the list of projects that I have taken part as Cost Estimator and were awarded to Precision 2000, Inc. 
•	Big Creek Expansion WRF - Phase 2B ($ 2,189,033.50)
•	Concrete Rehabilitation I-675 North and South Bound – GDOT ($ 13,699,531.00)
•	Barrier Wall T32-D7-PCC-I85 I75 Split SB - GDOT ($ 890,000.00)
•	PCC Pavement T32-D6-WHITFIELD – GDOT ($ 414,230.60)
profile_positions.title: Cost Estimator - Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
As Cost Estimator at Precision 2000, Inc. I was responsible for analyzing plans and specifications to prepare time, cost, materials, and labor estimates necessary to present formal bids to local, federal government and the private sector. I worked together with clients, engineers, and other personnel to solve problems related to cost estimates. Additionally, I developed cost strategies and models, based on performance data from current and past projects using Software and technology applications.

Below is the list of projects that I led as cost estimator and were awarded to Precision 2000, Inc. 
•	ATL Airport - Taxiway and Runway 9L - Curb & Gutters, Island ($294,939.00)
•	Robins Paving IDIQ 2017 part2 ($3,620,854.00)
•	DeKalb Sidewalk Program-Phase 2C - Dekalb County ($5,996,003.45)
•	Drainage Improvements on I-75 SR 401 at Peachtree Creek - Fulton County Call 006 – GDOT ($464,148.00)
profile_positions.title: Cost Estimator

profile_positions.description:
At Metrisi Group, my role was focus on the design and construction planning of tanks and environmental structures, based on the ACI 350-06 and the Colombian Code for Seismic design (NSR-10). 

Additionally, other activities under my responsibility were:
- Construction project scheduling including Time impact Analysis. 
- Analysis of compressive strength testing results, for concrete cylinders and cores.
- Cost estimating and evaluating the effectiveness of the cost estimating process.
- Structural drawing of different elements, especially tanks and environmental structures.
- Structural and concrete testing of some structures as buildings, bridges and pedestrian bridges.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Engineer

profile_positions.description: As Field and Office Engineer, I was responsible for the quality control at the construction site. Additionally, I was the main point of communication between the Project Manager and the crew on site. As a result, I was in charge of the field documentation including Daily Reports, Pre-Task Plans, Job Hazard Analysis and Accident Reports. Furthermore, I was the responsible to schedule deliveries of materials and equipment according to the project schedule.
profile_positions.title: Field and Office Engineer

profile_positions.description:
During the time that I worked at Metrisi, the main activities were focus on the design of tanks and environmental structures, based on the ACI 350-06 and the Colombian Code for Seismic design (NSR-10). Also, other of my activities were the development of recommendations for the reconstruction of some water systems, which were destroyed after the floods in Colombia in 2011.

In addition other minor activities on my charge were as follows:
-Analyzing the results of compressive strength testing for concrete cylinders and cores.
-Structural drawing of different elements, specially tanks and environmental structures.
-Structural and concrete testing of some structures as buildings, bridges and pedestrian bridge.
profile_positions.title: Office Engineer - Intern

company.name: Precision 2000 (P2K)
company.description: Precision 2000 (P2K) builds the infrastructure communities need to grow and flourish, providing construction services in public spaces and planned developments, as well as performing highly technical operations at locations like airports and military bases. We are committed to excellence in service and take pride in delivering exceptional outcomes for our clients.
